tidy xgboost

Source: R/tidy_xgboost.R
tidy_xgboost.Rd

Accepts a formula to run an xgboost model. Automatically determines whether the formula is for classification or regression. Returns the xgboost model.

tidy_xgboost(.data, formula)

plot_varimp_xgboost(xgb, font = c("", "HiraKakuProN-W3"), ...)

Arguments

.data

dataframe
formula

formula
xgb

xgb.Booster model
font

font
...

additional arguments for xgb.ggplot.importance

Value

xgb.Booster model

plot

Examples


iris %>%
tidy_xgboost(
  tidy_formula(., target= Petal.Length, tidyselect::everything())
)  -> xg1

xg1 %>%
  plot_varimp_xgboost()
